name: Dark Light (itch) (Louis Dunbavin)
description:
University project created as part of a group of four. An unknown evil haunts the shadows of your vessel, you must manage your power supply in order to keep the lights on as you try to escape the ship. Remember that your torch is your only friend, and darkness… means death.

Controls:

WASD + Mouse for Movement.

Shift - Sprint.

F - Activate Torch.

Left Click - Interact. 

This project was created in Unity.

Created in collaboration with Scott Watson, Sam Morgan and Sam Wiltshire.
